DialogueOption.Text: Hey, Galena. Got any questions about the universe for me?
I found a Nomai computer that predicts where meteors land on Brittle Hollow, but..
Hey, Galena. Got any questions about the universe for me?
I found a Nomai computer that predicts where meteors land on Brittle Hollow, but..
Hey, Galena. Got any questions about the universe for me?
I found a Nomai computer that predicts where meteors land on Brittle Hollow, but..

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>Is it true that Brittle Hollow's south pole is the safest spot on that planet from meteors?</size>

DialogueOption.Text: There's not really anywhere totally safe on Brittle Hollow because of the Quantum Moon.

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>Riebeck was really worried about their ship getting hit by a meteor and leaving them stranded.. So they studied where meteors tended to land on Brittle Hollow before they took off...</size>

<size=20>Riebeck told me that the safest spot on Brittle Hollow from meteors was the south pole, so that's where they'll leave their ship... But nobody in the village knows if that's really true.</size>
<size=20>Brittle Hollow looks so cool, I wanna go there if I become an astronaut one day.. But I don't want to be stranded there too...</size>

DialogueOption.Text: Maybe I'll go ask Riebeck what they know, then.

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>Just be careful where you land your ship on Brittle Hollow, okay..?</size>
<size=20>But.. Why is their computer sometimes right and sometimes wrong..?</size>

DialogueOption.Text: It's because the Quantum Moon's gravity messes with where meteors land.

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>But thanks for telling me, astronaut... Maybe you're sometimes right and sometimes wrong too...</size>
<size=20>The Quantum Moon.. You mean that weird moon that orbits around every planet in the star system, right..?</size>
<size=20>But if meteors are unpredictable, there really is nowhere safe on Brittle Hollow from meteors then...</size>
<size=20>If I become an astronaut, I'll just explore a planet that won't have to worry about meteors or the Quantum Moon...</size>

DialogueOption.Text: Hey, Galena. Got any questions about the universe for me?
I found a Nomai computer that predicts where meteors land on Brittle Hollow, but..
